body.p: Your highest we send the Dollar together for I was suddenly taken with a desire to get home and Started a Book. I could tell you the words which is the cause of my writing For, this bright beautiful day gave birth to young Walt Whitman, a name that Ben's baby was destined to bear, if it should prove a boy; more than Six months ago Ben came to this decision. And to day we are all rejoicing at the safe delivery of our Nellie of a little Walt of whom we are all very proud.

Ben had taken a jo job on mowing machines and is working himself
to death. I am still engaged in perfecting my invention by repeated experiments. I think I shall soon be able to show some results.
